Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Traits.Name: Ethereal
Traits.Description: Phasing, and has evasion unless there's an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Chain Lightning
Actions.Effect: A foe in range 3 from the attack target must save or take [D] piercing damage. If they fail the save, this effect repeats, from their location. A character can be hit multiple times by this effect.
